QuestData.Title: Fumping
QuestData.Description: How would you like to do a little more work for the Explorers' League? These bone worms have us all quite intrigued.$B$BI've got a drum right here that you can use out in the Bone Wastes. Just bang on the damned thing and see what you get. If it's a worm, kill it and bring back the carcass for us to study. We'll need a good lot of carcasses to get a valid testing sample.
QuestData.LogDescription: Dwarfowitz at the Sha'tari Base Camp in the Bone Wastes wants you to bring him 8 Mature Bone Sifter Carcasses.
QuestData.CompletionText: We think the one that popped up at the dig was actually a baby worm!
QuestData.RewardText: Sand gnomes? Yea, sure... The desert can do strange things to a person.$B$BI think we're about to make a breakthrough here with these worms!
